AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqgated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for gated: Checks whether the system is configured to be a router or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for IPSec: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnosyn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for NoSyn: Checks whether IPSec is enabled or not. If it is not, then enables it.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for root login: Checks whether any non-root user exists that has login privileges.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqrrl
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for remote root login: Checks whether any non-root user exists with privileges to login remotely.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqsed
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for SED: Checks whether the machine has 64 bit kernel support or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqda
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for disableacct: Adds /bin/false to shells in login.cfg, if it does not exist.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has Trusted Execution feature on or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum age for password: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements before a password can be changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stops Trusted Execution.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum age for password: Removes any maximum number of weeks requirements that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Time to change password after the expiration: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements after maxage that an expired password can be changed by the user.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum length for password: Removes the minimum length constraint on password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of alphabetic chars: Removes the minimum number of alphabetic characters constraint in a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Minimum number of non-alphabetic chars: Removes the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters constraint in a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Maximum times a char can appear in a password: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 8.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reset time: Removes any minimum number of weeks requirements before a password can be reused.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Password reuse limit: Removes the constraint on the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Number of login attempts before locking the account: Removes the constraint on the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts per non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_logindisable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove the unsuccessful login constraint: Removes the constraint on the number of unsuccessful login attempts on a port before the port can be locked.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_loginreenable
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Reenable login after locking: Removes any time interval after which a port is unlocked after being disabled by logindisable.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remote root login: Enables remote root login.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Local login: Enables root to login locally.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_pciaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable audit: Disables bin auditing.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_distimedmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable timed daemon: Stops timed daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disntpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Stops NTP daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disrwhoddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rwhod daemon: Stops rwhod daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_dissnmpdmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable SNMP daemon: Enables SNMP daemon and uncomments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_dissnmpmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enables SNMPMIBD daemon: Starts SNMPMIBD daemon and uncomments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disaixmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable AIXMIBD daemon: Starts AIXMIBD daemon and uncomments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_hostmibddmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable HOSTMIBD daemon: Starts HOSTMIBD daemon and uncomments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disdpid2dmn
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DPID2 daemon: Stops DPID2 daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disdhcpserv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DHCP Server: Stops DHCP server daemon and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disdhcpagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable DHCP Agent: Stops DHCP relay agent and comments it's entry in /etc/rc.tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_shell
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable rshd daemon: Uncomments the entry for rshd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and starts rshd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable rlogin in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for rlogind daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and starts rlogind daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rexecd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable rexecd in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for rexecd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and starts rexecd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_comsat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable comsat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for comsat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of comsat.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_fingerd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable fingerd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for fingerd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of fingerd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_systat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable systat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for systat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of systat.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_netstat
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable netstat in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for netstat daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and stops instances of netstat.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable tftpd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for tftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_talk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable talkd in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for talkd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and starts talkd service.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rquotad
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rquotad in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rquotad daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rquotad.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rstatd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rstatd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rstatd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rstatd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rusersd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable ruserd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rusersd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rusersd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rwalld
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable rwalld in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for rwalld daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of rwalld.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_sprayd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable sprayd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for sprayd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of sprayd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_pcnfsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable pcnfsd in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for pcnfsd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of pcnfsd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of echo(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of discard(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for TCP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for TCP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and starts daytime(tcp) service.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for TCP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and starts timed(tcp).

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_udpecho
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP echo service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of UDP echo.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_udpdiscard
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP discard service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of UDP discard.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_udpchargen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf: Comments the entry for UDP chargen service in /etc/inetd.conf and kills all instances of chargen.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_udpdaytime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for UDP daytime service in /etc/inetd.conf and starts the daytime service.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for UDP time service in /etc/inetd.conf and starts the time service(udp).

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_ftp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable ftpd: Uncomments the entry for ftpd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and starts ftpd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_telnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable telnetd: Uncomments the entry for telnetd daemon in /etc/inetd.conf and starts telnetd daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable dtspc: Comments the entry for dtspc daemon in /etc/inetd.conf when LFT is not configured and CDE is disabled in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_ttdbserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for ttdbserver service in /etc/inetd.conf and starts ttdbserver service.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf: Uncomments the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and starts cmsd service.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rmsuidfrmrcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set SUID of remote commands: Sets SUID of remote commands rcp rdist rexec remsh rlogin and rsh.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_filepermgr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: File Permissions Manager: Runs fpm command with default option to restore back the setuid setgid on the privileged commands.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_enablenfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable NFS daemon: Enables NFS mounts, starts NFS daemons and enables NFS from startup.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disrmtcmds
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable unsecure commands: Enables unsecure commands rlogin rsh rcp and tftp.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disrmtdmns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Enable unsecure daemons: Enables unsecure daemons rlogind rshd and tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rmrhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove rhosts and netrc services: Removes .rhosts and .netrc files from user's home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file: Removes entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option clean_partial_conns: Set network option clean_partial_conns's value to default value.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcp_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Network option tcp_tcpsecure: Set network option tcp_tcpsecure to default value.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Object creation permissions: Specifies default object creation permissions to 022.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_limitsysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Limit system access: Removes the file cron.allow and removes all entries in cron.deny file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from root path: Removes dot from PATH environment variable from files .profile .kshrc .cshrc and .login in root's home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_rmdotfrmpathnroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove dot from non-root path: Removes dot from PATH environment variable from files .profile .kshrc .cshrc and .login in user's home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove root user in /etc/ftpusers file: Removes root's entry from /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_removeguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Add guest account: Adds guest account.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_autologoff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set session idle time: Require the user to renter password if the session is idle for more than 15 minutes.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_defaultssh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Set the SSH configuration settings back to default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disableacct
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Remove the restriction of locking an account, if it is inactive for 35 days.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_tcptr
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Removes denial-of-service mitigation on popular ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_ipsecshunhost
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Shuns the hosts for 5 minutes that tried to access un-used ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_ipsecshunports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Shuns the ports for 5 minutes that tried to access un-used ports.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_SecureLPM
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Disable automated IPSEC Tunnel creation between VIO Servers during live partition migration.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_SSLpop3d
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Sets TLS and SSL attributes to default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_SSLimapd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Sets TLS and SSL attributes to default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_disablesendmail
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Sets TLS and SSL attributes to default.

AIXPertEntry.name: dls_pwdalgchk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Sets password algorithm to default.
